params.borrows: The total amount of borrows the market has outstanding
params.cash: The total amount of cash the market has
params.reserves: The total amount of reserves the market has

returns._0: The borrow rate per block (as a percentage, and scaled by 1e18)

params.borrows: The total amount of borrows the market has outstanding
params.cash: The total amount of cash the market has
params.reserveFactorMantissa: The current reserve factor the market has
params.reserves: The total amount of reserves the market has

returns._0: The supply rate per block (as a percentage, and scaled by 1e18)

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the current borrow interest rate per block

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Calculates the current supply interest rate per block

isInterestRateModel().notice: Indicator that this is an InterestRateModel contract (for inspection)
